title: RPG Music - Fantasy Music - Cinematic Music - Game Music - Background Music
description: 10 Fantasy RPG Pieces that will take your game to the next level! (Fantasy Music, RPG Music, Game Music, Background Music, Emotional Music, Cinematic Music, Orchestral Music, JRPG Music, Inspiring Music, Music Loops)
longDescription:
> Listen Here! < | ⬆️Upgrade Now! And Get All Of Our Music Forever In The Ultimate Music Bundle (113 Tracks)



  • All tracks are Loopable to ensure hassle free integration with your game :)
  • 100% Royalty Free - All Tracks Are 100% Royalty Free! Use in your Commercial Games, Videos, Streams or anything else you create!

﻿

Story:

The idea for this pack came from one of our discord community members "Xander" We bonded over our common love for music and got some pointers on which tracks to make in order to satisfy every game dev's itch for fantasy RPG music, This is the result. Our largest most ambitious music pack to date!


This pack contains 10 Inspiring soundtracks and all of their respective Stems and loops Each Track was professionally composed, mixed and mastered by a professional composer/engineer team!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 160

Number of Audio Cues: 160

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: 25
